column1: suspected  or  accused  of  an  offence  under  subsection  (1)  of  section
(a) of which the pure quantity of the dangerous drug, trafficked,
imported,  exported  or  possessed  is  ten  grammes  or  above  in
terms  of  the  report  issued  by  the  Government  Analyst  under
(b) which is punishable with death or life imprisonment,
